definition: class or grade/generation/plaintiff and defendant (old)/government department (old)
everything in disorder (idiom); in a hideous mess/at sixes and sevens
to waste/to defile/to abuse/to insult/to defile/to trample on/to wreck/also pr. [zao1 ta5]
to waste/to spoil/to destroy/to insult grievously
to remove the dross/to discard the dregs
everything in disorder (idiom)/in a hideous mess/obscene/dirty/filthy

sentences.english: Things aren't that bad right now.
Your approach convinced me that the maintainability problem is not as bad as it could be.
sentences.chinese: 您的方法讓我相信可維護性問題並非想象的那樣糟。

sentences.english: It would suck to fall from that height.
sentences.chinese: 如果在這個高度掉下橋去那就糟了。

sentences.english: Efficiency is priority No. 1, people. Because waste is a thief.
sentences.chinese: 人們效率第一，由於糟躂就是盜竊行爲。

sentences.english: Pull a sled into the mud, so we worse calamity.
sentences.chinese: 把雪橇拖進泥塘裏，害得我們糟了殃。

sentences.english: But if the bed- making is particularly pathetic, it may be a sabotage maneuver.
sentences.chinese: 但如果被子疊得特別糟，也許是故意的。

sentences.english: She always let you eat it with her to eat it, completely ignoring how bad your appetite.
sentences.chinese: 她總是讓你陪她喫這喫那，全然不顧你的胃口有多糟。

sentences.english: But the longer you wait the worse the tension inside becomes.
sentences.chinese: 但你等待的時間越長，你內心緊張感會變得越來越糟。

sentences.english: All of a sudden, it occurred to me that my money was missing.
sentences.chinese: 忽然，我只感到腦瓜子嗡地一下響，糟了，錢沒了。

sentences.english: Being?French, it's surprising that she's such a terrible cook.
sentences.chinese: 她是法國人，但她做飯做得那麼糟真是令人感到驚奇。

sentences.english: Why do these photo-booth photos always come out so bad?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼這些快照相片都這麼糟？

sentences.english: And we do our best, however good or bad that may be.
sentences.chinese: 我們會盡力，不論有多好或多糟。

sentences.english: Note that the layout of some pages can get messed up.
sentences.chinese: 注意有些頁面的佈局可能會變亂七捌糟。

sentences.english: Outside Peking duck, thefood in the north is awful.
sentences.chinese: 北京烤鴨，這道北方菜真是太糟了，味道又淡又油膩。

sentences.english: Things seem to be going from bad to worse nowadays.
But for Brant Pierson things aren't quite as tight.
sentences.chinese: 但是在布蘭特皮爾森看來，事情並不那麼糟。

definition: everything in disorder (idiom); in a hideous mess/at sixes and sevens
in confusion or disorder/in a confused state of mind/disorder/upheaval/riot/illicit sexual relations/to throw into disorder/to mix up/indiscriminate/random/arbitrary
bad/spoiled/broken/to break down/(suffix) to the utmost
muddled and completely collapsing (idiom); in an awful condition/complete shambles/a total mess
